files.patch:
@@ -681,1 +681,8 @@ - /** Returns the list of child preview nodes to be merged into the given directory. */ + /** + * Returns the list of child preview nodes to be merged into the given directory. + * + *

Because this is only called once per-directory (since the result is cached + * indefinitely) we can remove any entries we find from the cache. If ever the + * node cache allowed entries to expire, this would have to be changed so that + * directories could be completed more than once. + */ @@ -684,1 +691,1 @@ - Directory mergeDir = previewDirectoriesToMerge.get(dir.getName()); + Directory mergeDir = previewDirectoriesToMerge.remove(dir.getName());
